General.Name: Mieco Chipboard Bhd
General.Description: Mieco Chipboard Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells wood-based products in Malaysia, Hong Kong, China, and internationally. The company offers chipboards and related products, particle boards, and medium density fibre boards; and provides management services. Mieco Chipboard Berhad was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Cheras, Malaysia.
